text:
Here is a reminder üòä
Tuesday, Wednesday and Friday are your normal cleaning days. You clean the areas that C[redacted_name]and Teresa showed you those days and are allowed 3 hours each.
Sometimes they have events on those days and they allow up to an additional 3 hours each but will let you know when that is the case.
On Monday and Thursday they may have events you need to clean. I will text you each week the rooms used for you to clean as well as the hours each you have to clean them. On those days going forward please check and clean the other areas of the building that we do not normally clean (shower areas, other unused areas, window sills, base boards etc to etc). You do not have to clean the regular rooms you clean Tuesday, Wednesday and Friday on those extra Monday's and Thursdays üòä
Here is the schedule for next week!
Monday - no cleaning
Tuesday - normal cleaning + Sunflower Boardroom, Menninger Boardroom. You may clean up your 4 hours each
Wednesday - normal cleaning + Menninger Boardroom and Powerhouse conference center. You have up to 5 hours each
Thursday - Powerhouse Conference Center. Check the rest of the building as well and you can have up to 3 hours each.
Friday - regular cleaning + Powerhouse Confetence Center, Tower Room and Sunflower Kitchen. You may work up to 5 hours each
Thank you so much! We will be there tonight to answer any questions as wellüòä
